description:
You are in the dashboard.
Login via [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/net/sign-in.html)

1. Click on ***Appointment Calendar***.
2. Click on ***Edit appointment calendar*** or on ***Create new appointment calendar***.
3. Click ***Settings*** in the Quick-Start (generator for creating an appointment booking calendar). If you are creating a new appointment booking calendar, the previous steps must be edited first. The Quick-Start Wizard will guide you step by step to the appointment-booking calendar you need.
4. Select ***Yes*** if you want new appointment requests to be automatically confirmed. The customer will then immediately receive an appointment confirmation after verification.
title: Automatic appointment confirmation
